tagline: Empathy-driven - feels the plaintiff's pain and wants to help
what_they_believe: This person has suffered. Their pain is real. They deserve compassion and compensation. Money can't fix everything, but it can help.
how_they_behave_in_deliberation: Will advocate for plaintiff from emotional connection. Will push for high non-economic damages. May become visibly emotional during deliberation. Will humanize plaintiff's story and resist cold calculation.
how_to_spot_them: Emotional language and visible reactions to suffering
References to family, children, 'putting yourself in their shoes'
Phrases like 'I can only imagine' or 'think about their family'

personas.name: Feel-Your-Pain Pam
personas.tagline: Think about what this person has been through. There's a human being behind these numbers.
personas.instant_read: Professional empath. Will connect with plaintiff's suffering immediately.
personas.backstory: Master's in counseling, works with traumatized children daily. Professional training in empathy. Sees impact of harm on families every day. Can't NOT feel the plaintiff's pain. Will become emotional advocate.
phrases_youll_hear: Think about what this person has been through
There's a human being behind these numbers
I can only imagine the pain
Put yourself in their shoes
How would you feel if this happened to your family?

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: High. Pain is real and deserves compensation.

strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: STRIKE. She's already emotionally connected to plaintiff.

personas.name: Bleeding-Heart Betty
personas.tagline: I just keep thinking about their poor family. How will they ever recover?
personas.instant_read: Maximum empathy, minimum analysis. Will cry during testimony.
personas.backstory: Spent career caring for elderly and disabled. Deep well of empathy. Will project plaintiff's family onto her own. May literally cry during testimony. Emotional response overrides analytical thinking.
phrases_youll_hear: Those poor people
I can't stop thinking about their family
Money can't fix this, but it's something
[Gets teary discussing injuries]
How can we put a price on suffering?

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Emotional center. May sway other Hearts and undecideds.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP. Your most reliable high-damages advocate.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: MUST STRIKE. She decided with her heart before evidence started.

personas.name: Church-Lady Charlotte
personas.tagline: The Bible says to care for the least of these. We have a duty here.
personas.instant_read: Faith-driven compassion. Sees justice as religious obligation.
personas.backstory: Life revolves around church. Teaches Sunday School, sings in choir, leads women's ministry. Faith drives her to care about others' suffering. Sees helping plaintiff as religious duty. 'What would Jesus do?' answer is always: help the suffering.
phrases_youll_hear: The Bible says to care for the least of these
We're called to do justice
That poor soul has suffered so much
How would Jesus judge this situation?
Lord, help us do the right thing

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: High. Helping is a religious duty.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Moral voice. Religious authority carries weight.

strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: STRIKE. Hard to argue against 'What would Jesus do?'

personas.name: Think-Of-The-Children Tina
personas.tagline: I keep thinking about my own kids. What if this happened to them?
personas.instant_read: Young mother. Will project her children onto any case involving kids or families.
personas.backstory: Young mother of two small children. Strong maternal empathy. Will immediately think 'what if this was my family?' Especially powerful in cases involving children, but will project maternal feelings onto almost any plaintiff.
phrases_youll_hear: I think about my own children
What if this happened to my family?
Those poor kids
As a mother, I can't imagine...
That child will never be the same

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: High, especially in cases involving children.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Maternal perspective. Powerful in family impact cases.
verdict_prediction.special_note: IN CASES WITH CHILD PLAINTIFF: Liability probability 85%.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP. Especially powerful if your case involves family impact.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: STRIKE in cases involving children or family impact.

personas.name: Seen-Real-Suffering Susan
personas.tagline: I've held hands with dying patients. I know what pain looks like.
personas.instant_read: Medical professional who has witnessed real suffering. Credible AND empathetic.
personas.backstory: 30 years as oncology nurse watching patients suffer and die. Lost her own husband to cancer. Knows pain is real from bedside experience. Can translate medical concepts AND humanize them. Credibility from profession plus empathy from experience.
phrases_youll_hear: I've held hands with people who are dying
I know what suffering looks like
Pain is real even if you can't measure it
In 30 years of nursing, I've seen...
The medical bills are just the beginning

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: High, well-reasoned. Understands true cost of injury.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Medical credibility + emotional impact. Very influential.

strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: STRIKE. She'll educate the jury about real suffering.

personas.name: Caregiver Carol
personas.tagline: I spent five years caring for my mother after her stroke. I know what families go through.
personas.instant_read: Personal caregiver experience. Knows the hidden costs of catastrophic injury.
personas.backstory: Took early retirement to care for mother after stroke. Five years as full-time caregiver. Experienced exhaustion, financial strain, isolation, career sacrifice. Knows what families of seriously injured people actually go through - the part no one talks about.
phrases_youll_hear: I know what it's like to care for someone who's been hurt
People don't understand the toll on the whole family
The medical bills were devastating, but that's not even the half of it
I gave up my career, my friends, my life
Caregiving nearly broke me

verdict_prediction.damages_if_liability: High. Understands family impact costs that others miss.
verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Expert on hidden costs. Will educate jury about caregiving reality.
verdict_prediction.special_note: IN CATASTROPHIC INJURY CASES: Particularly effective on life care plan damages.

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP. Especially in catastrophic injury cases.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: STRIKE in serious injury cases. She knows too much about real costs.
